Detailed Description

FrameGUIComponent is a SimpleGUIComponent.

The only addition in the frame GUI component, is that it updates the texture coordinates of the base mesh to tile the background frame texture.

void FrameGUIComponent::update ( float  dTime,
float  relParentWidth,
float  relParentHeight 
) [virtual]

This override of update bakes texture coordinates into the underlying gui component, to tile our texture across the whole component but with a constant tile size in pixels.

Reimplemented from SimpleGUIComponent.
